scripts.db:push: pnpm --filter api exec prisma db push --schema=prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:seed: pnpm --filter api exec prisma db seed --schema=prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:reset: pnpm --filter api prisma migrate reset --force --skip-generate --skip-seed && pnpm db:seed
scripts.e2e: pnpm exec playwright install && pnpm exec playwright test
scripts.dev:e2e: start-server-and-test "pnpm --filter web dev -p 3000" http://localhost:3000 "pnpm exec playwright test"
scripts.setup:all: pnpm install && pnpm --filter web build && pnpm run setup:e2e
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run test && pnpm exec prisma validate && pnpm exec playwright install --with-deps && pnpm --filter web build && pnpm --filter web exec playwright test
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm exec eslint apps/api apps/web apps/mobile-uber-polished --ext .js,.jsx,.ts,.tsx --fix
scripts.check:ci: pnpm run lint && pnpm run typecheck && pnpm run test && pnpm --filter api exec prisma validate && pnpm exec playwright install --with-deps && pnpm --filter web build && pnpm --filter web exec playwright test
